channel.title: Donator Items Help!
channel.description: Hi i recently put a donator only code and it worked but now when you are donator it doesnt let you use or wear the item other.

item.title: Donator Items Help!
item.dc:creator: @DannyBoy1995 DannyBoy1995
item.description:
@DannyBoy1995 wrote:

[quote=“Zivearia, post:16, topic:390528”][quote author=DannyBoy1995 link=topic=486439.msg3565049#msg3565049 date=1302572823]

if(c.Donatorreq > 0){ { c.sendMessage("Sorry only donators can wear this item"); else canWearItem = true; } }

I don’t know if this will work, and do not say i’m leeching your codes.

l0l! you said for me to post the codes and i did and that was what like 2 hours ago and your just replying now??? kind of funny its taken you this long.
[/quote]

I have homework, i do homework, why would i want your codes. Honestly shut up, there could be multipul reasons of why i had not replied for that time period. Theres so many tutorials or snippets on this shit, why on earth would I need your codes.

EDIT: Besides, how do you magically want people to help you without knowing anything. It doesn’t matter, your donator system isn’t unique people could rip it out of many other sources. Thanks.[/quote]
Ok for one i bet you dont even do homework and i bet i am right with you leeching my codes you asked for them i posted them like 2 mins after you asked and you were still online i saw your status and you didnt reply so dont pull any bullshit and btw obviously if you guys cant figure out how to make my items donator well then theres gotta be something unique about it doesnt it? thanks.

Read full topic

item.title: Donator Items Help!
item.dc:creator: @Zivearia Zivearia
item.description:
@Zivearia wrote:

[quote=“DannyBoy1995, post:15, topic:390528”][quote author=Zivearia link=topic=486439.msg3565043#msg3565043 date=1302572575]

if(c.Donatorreq > 0){ { c.sendMessage("Sorry only donators can wear this item"); else canWearItem = true; } }

I don’t know if this will work, and do not say i’m leeching your codes.
[/quote]
l0l! you said for me to post the codes and i did and that was what like 2 hours ago and your just replying now??? kind of funny its taken you this long. :|[/quote]

I have homework, i do homework, why would i want your codes. Honestly shut up, there could be multipul reasons of why i had not replied for that time period. Theres so many tutorials or snippets on this shit, why on earth would I need your codes.

EDIT: Besides, how do you magically want people to help you without knowing anything. It doesn’t matter, your donator system isn’t unique people could rip it out of many other sources. Thanks.

Read full topic

item.title: Donator Items Help!
item.dc:creator: @DannyBoy1995 DannyBoy1995
item.description:
@DannyBoy1995 wrote:

[quote=“sk8rdude461, post:10, topic:390528”][quote author=DannyBoy1995 link=topic=486439.msg3564955#msg3564955 date=1302567772]

simple fix, i think. change this:

if(c.Donatorreq > 0){ { c.sendMessage(""); canWearItem = false; } } "i think the other guy was leeching my code l0l!"
into:

if(c.Donatorreq < 0){ { c.sendMessage(""); canWearItem = false; } } "i think the other guy was leeching my code l0l!"
Tell me if it works. i have other ideas. but 1 at a time

No it doesnt work we can wear the item but non-donors can wear it also.
[/quote]
Try making this (original code):

if(c.Donatorreq > 0){ { c.sendMessage(""); canWearItem = false; } } "i think the other guy was leeching my code l0l!"
this:

if(c.Donatorreq > 0){ { c.sendMessage(""); canWearItem = true; } } "i think the other guy was leeching my code l0l!"
How about now?[/quote]
it says you must be donator to use/wear the item but it doesnt do it it still allows the person to wear it.

Read full topic

this:

How about now?

item.title: Donator Items Help!
item.dc:creator: @DannyBoy1995 DannyBoy1995
item.description:
@DannyBoy1995 wrote:

[quote=“sk8rdude461, post:6, topic:390528”][quote author=DannyBoy1995 link=topic=486439.msg3564925#msg3564925 date=1302566587]

Can you post the codes?

did you get the codes?? can u help?

you should’ve posted. most people that try and help want the codes… but if you only send to one person. he/she might not b able to help…

no i posted them for him to look over and he never posted back so i removed my old post and posted a new one cause no one helped.
[/quote]
repost codes?[/quote]
ok heres the code:
if(c.Donatorreq > 0){ {
c.sendMessage("");
canWearItem = false;
}
}
“i think the other guy was leeching my code l0l!”

Read full topic
